data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I., Broad, Gavin R. (2013): Tersilochinae (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae) of Costa Rica, part 2. Genera Megalochus gen. nov. and Stethantyx Townes. Zootaxa 3693 (2): 221-266, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3693.2.8
